articles.title: Building Trust in Marketing: Navigating AI's Influence in the Digital Era
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Digitas Peru launched the 'Indispensables' campaign for Florida Tuna, leveraging the insight that the tuna is a pantry staple in Peruvian homes. Optus, an Australian telecommunications provider, is working to improve brand sentiment after a data breach.

articles.title: 43 Products That Basically Just Scream, 'Fall Is Here'
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Various companies are introducing new products focused on comfort and ambiance for the autumn season. Examples include the Lola Blanket, flameless flickering candles, Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day "Fall Leaves" Hand Soap, and a sleek, whisper-quiet air purifier. The article also mentions a mini projector for a home movie theater experience and an electric gooseneck kettle for tea enthusiasts.

articles.title: HAGO Africa Launches to Bridge Trust Gap Between Customers, Vendors
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: HAGO Africa has launched a digital marketplace for services in Nigeria. The platform aims to address challenges of trust and efficiency within the informal service sector by providing a transparent and secure connection between customers and service professionals.

articles.title: 28 Products For First-Time Homeowners
articles.author: Karly Jacklin
articles.summary: The content introduces a range of household cleaning and maintenance products. These include stain removers, polishing sprays, cleaning tools, and odor eliminators designed for various surfaces and purposes, such as removing hard water stains, cleaning dishwashers, polishing silver, and removing pet hair.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold: 3 Key Features On The New Big-Screen Pixel
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google launched its latest folding phone, which shares a similar appearance to the previous year's model but incorporates changes in three specific areas.

articles.title: Oral-B iO 9 Review AI Smart Toothbrush Elevates Oral Care
articles.author: Naveen
articles.summary: Oral-B launched the iO Series 9, an AI-driven electric toothbrush with features like a 360-degree smart pressure sensor, multiple cleaning modes, and AI Brushing Recognition Technology that tracks coverage in real-time via a companion mobile app. The toothbrush also features a full-color OLED display that provides feedback and gamifies the brushing routine.

articles.title: Saudi Arabia's cloud kitchen evolution: from hidden kitchens to branded empires
articles.author: Waad Hussain
articles.summary: Faris Breakfast expanded its offerings by launching a cloud kitchen. Foodtech platform Kaykroo launched 77 digital-first brands in Saudi Arabia. Earth Art, a delivery-only food brand, was launched by Kenzy Al-Harbi, focusing on visual aesthetics and high-end comfort food.

articles.title: First look inside Frurt as frozen yogurt café opens in Friargate
articles.summary: Frurt Frozen Yogurt has launched its largest store to date in Preston, offering six flavors of frozen yogurt with various toppings and sauces. The store, located on Friargate, also sells coffee and protein snacks and is considering developing breakfast-focused products. The store is open until 2 am and has 15 staff members.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold: 3 Key Features On The New Big-Screen Pixel
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, featuring an updated gearless hinge, a larger 5,015mAh battery offering up to 30 hours of life, and Pixelsnap, enabling compatibility with Qi2 wireless charging systems. The external display is fractionally bigger than its predecessor, with a 8 inches internal display.

articles.title: Cleaner's $3 supermarket solution to annoying laundry issue: 'Really good wash'
articles.author: Marni Dixit
articles.summary: CHOICE tested over 50 laundry detergents and found Omo Powder to be the top performer for front loaders, while Aldi's Trimat Advanced Laundry Powder Concentrate excelled in top loaders. Aldi's detergent offers a more cost-effective wash at 52 cents compared to Omo Powder's 83 cents, making it a strong alternative.

articles.title: A Customer Complained About The New Small Sized Bottles Of Jergens Lotion
articles.author: Matthew Gilligan
articles.summary: Jergens has introduced a new line of small lotion options.  A TikTok user expressed concerns about the product's quality, likening it to lotion that crusts around the tube.

articles.title: Sam's Club to implement a new San Antonio member change within hours
articles.author: my SA
articles.summary: A company is launching a new service called "early shopping hour" for its members. This provides members with an exclusive shopping opportunity.

articles.title: Nubia Z80 Ultra Unveiled: Showcasing Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 in Official Photos
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nubia has launched the Z80 Ultra smartphone, featuring the new Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor. The phone boasts a 6.8-inch AMOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate, a 200MP primary camera sensor, and a 5,500mAh battery with 120W fast charging. The new processor offers a performance increase of up to 30% compared to the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3.

articles.title: WHMCS Alternative Domain and Web Hosting Order System with Web Hosting Template
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart is a PHP software for domain and hosting resellers. It features domain availability checks using WHOIS, RDAP, DNS, and Registrar API. The software also includes an AI domain suggestion tool, multi-coupon code support, over 25 payment options with multi-currency support, and a shopping cart for adding domains.

articles.title: David Borrett: Andover's Anton Laundry and the Royal Warrant
articles.author: David Borrett
articles.summary: In 1966, Anton Laundry added a dry-cleaning department as part of its modernizing program. The dry-cleaning process included chemical stain removal, washing, spinning, drying using perchloroethylene, and ironing. While there was dry-cleaning competition in Andover, problem stains were often sent to Anton Laundry.

articles.title: Vivo to launch OriginOS globally on October 15
articles.author: Ira James
articles.summary: vivo will launch its new smartphone operating system, OriginOS, globally on October 15, 2025, in Shanghai. OriginOS, previously exclusive to China, features a fluid interface, intelligent features, and extensive customization options, and the vivo X300 series will be the first smartphones to use OriginOS 6.

articles.title: Aldi's New Perk: Is It Worth the Cost?
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Aldi has partnered with Instacart to offer grocery delivery, expanding its reach to customers who value convenience. This partnership acknowledges the shift in consumer expectations towards online grocery shopping and aims to capture a wider customer base. The move signifies a strategic shift for budget retailers competing in the evolving grocery landscape.

articles.title: Turn your bathroom into a tranquil spa with Lidl's £7.99 shower buy
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Livarno LED Light-Up Shower Head for £7.99, featuring water-powered lights and anti-limescale nozzles. Other new Lidl bathroom products include the Livarno Toilet Night Light (£2.99), an extendable shower caddy (£14.99), a towel holder (£12.99), and a toilet seat (£11.99).

articles.title: Turn your bathroom into a tranquil spa with Lidl's £7.99 shower buy
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Livarno LED Light-Up Shower Head for £7.99, a product that requires no batteries and lights up with water power. Additionally, Lidl is introducing other bathroom accessories, including Livarno's Toilet Night Light for £2.99, an extendable shower caddy for £14.99, a towel holder for £12.99, and a toilet seat for £11.99.

articles.title: If You Refuse To Download TikTok, Here Are 27 Trending Products You Might Regret Missing
articles.author: Mariel Guzman
articles.summary: Puracy launched an enzyme-based laundry stain remover for fabrics. Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream with ingredients like aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Lumify launched eye drops that visibly leave your eyes redness-free. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash inspired by their facial Super Serum formulated with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for glowing, moisturized skin. Death Wish launched Instant Coffee Packets with 300 mg of caffeine per packet, to provide needed energy boost. Clinique launched Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey that can help keep your lips moisturized, while also adding a buildable tint.

articles.title: 32 Products That Should Be In The Beauty Hall Of Fame
articles.author: Becca Glasser-Baker
articles.summary: Rare Beauty by Selena Gomez released a magical liquid blush, celebrated for its pigmentation and blendability. Glossier offers Perfecting Skin Tint for a flawless skin look with minimal effort and a lippie that combines lip balm and lipstick benefits. Sol De Janerio promotes its Brazilian Bum Bum Cream, recognized for its scent and skin-softening qualities.

articles.title: Aldi brings back La Mer dupe that's £150 cheaper & will save your skin this winter
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Aldi is re-introducing its Lacura La Soie Facial Moisturiser, priced at £6 for 30ml, as an affordable alternative to La Mer's Moisturising Soft Cream. The Lacura moisturiser contains algae extract, macadamia, and sesame seed oils and aims to soothe, lift, and firm skin. In addition, Aldi is launching £3.99 tanning beauty dupe.

articles.title: Eitton Robot Vacuum Cleaner that has 'exceeded expectations' of shoppers now 50% off on Amazon
articles.author: Ambarish Awale
articles.summary: eitton has launched its Robot Vacuum Cleaner with Mop, available on Amazon for £129.99. The device combines 4-in-1 functionality, 5000Pa suction, and smart navigation, making it suitable for various floor types and pet hair. It is app and voice assistant controlled, has a 2600mAh battery and 300ml dustbin, and includes a 12-month warranty.

articles.title: Sandisk Creator Phone SSD review: Great MagSafe hack for iPhone users tired of deleting photos
articles.author: Sami Khan
articles.summary: Sandisk has launched the Creator Phone SSD, priced at Rs 10,999 for 1TB, targeting content creators needing on-the-go storage solutions. The SSD is MagSafe compatible for iPhones and features a USB 3.2 Gen 2 interface for fast transfer speeds up to 1000 MB/s, working across platforms like Android and Windows.

articles.title: The wind cooled down after the holiday, which was at the end of summer. It's the season of organizin..
articles.author: Lee Yu-Jin
articles.summary: Lundrigo is running an 'affordable closet organization' campaign offering a free knitwear laundry coupon and old clothes collection. Musinsa launched Musinsa Yuzd, a used clothing collection and resale service. Laundrie 24 is holding a 'laundry 0 won' event and Cleantopia introduced yellowing removal and hiking boot protection services.

articles.title: 33 Organization Products To Declutter Your Messy Home
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: Various organizers and storage solutions have been introduced for household items. These include organizers for makeup, food containers, shoes, cleaning supplies, water bottles, drawers, plastic bags, sinks, clothes, coffee pods, accessories, desks, records, purses, cables, towels, blankets, drawers, silverware, toys, food, and cookware. The solutions aim to save space, improve organization, and enhance aesthetics.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 vs. Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold: Head-to-Head Comparison and Verdict Summary
articles.summary: The Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold and Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 are new foldable phones competing in the market. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold features dust resistance, MagSafe compatibility via PixelSnap, and a year of Gemini AI Pro access, while the Galaxy Z Fold 7 boasts a slimmer design, reduced crease, and a refined AI suite. Both phones offer unique strengths in design, display technology, performance, and camera capabilities, catering to different user preferences.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 vs. Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold: We compared the two, ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Samsung and Google have introduced new foldable devices tailored to different user preferences. The article provides guidance to users to determine which device best suits their needs.

articles.title: 'The Body Shop Advent Calendar introduced me to a product I won't give up'
articles.summary: The Body Shop has launched its Ultimate Beauty Advent Calendar for 2025, priced at £120 and containing 25 items worth £238. The advent calendar includes full-sized products like the Passionfruit Shower Gel, Shea Shampoo, and Camomile Cleansing Butter, offering a variety of bathing products, skin care items, and hand creams.

articles.title: 30 Finds That'll Exponentially Improve Your Home Life
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Capri Blue launched a Volcano-scented multipurpose cleaner. Pikk-it introduced a tool to remove hair from vacuums and hairbrushes. Tibet Almond released a scratch remover stick for concealing imperfections. Snug Plugs released product that fixes loose outlets. Miss Mouth's launched Messy Eater Stain Treater Spray for food stains.

articles.title: Four apps and a website that are both useful and a delight
articles.author: Dwight Silverman
articles.summary: Shutter Declutter app uses a swipe-based interface for photo management, offering a free trial and paid subscriptions. Google launched an experimental desktop Google search app for Windows, accessible via Google Labs. Particle, a news app created by engineers from Twitter and Tesla, utilizes AI to personalize news feeds and track topics of interest.

articles.title: Chipotle Founder Launches Fourth Restaurant Concept Aiming To Reinvent the Sandwich Market
articles.author: Jim Hoffman
articles.summary: Steve Ells, founder of Chipotle, launched Counter Service, a sandwich shop chain that blends hands-on cooking with data-driven technology to optimize efficiency and freshness. Counter Service focuses on hot-roasted meats and house-made ingredients, utilizing software analytics to streamline operations, reduce waste, and enhance consistency. The company plans to expand with several New York units in 2025.

articles.title: "Dad Said You Won't Turn on Again": Girl Sobs While Saying Goodbye to Her Broken AI Toy
articles.author: Joe Wilkins
articles.summary: The XiaoZhi AI Voice Chat Robot Ball, a multi-purpose home network device powered by DeepSeek's language models, is an AI robot toy. DeepSeek is a Chinese AI company that released its V3 model.

articles.title: If Your Favorite Words Are 'Food' And 'Sleep,' These 29 Cool Products Will Make You Very Happy
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Nuts 'N More launched Chocolate Maple Pretzel Peanut Butter Spread. Hatch released the Restore 3, a sunrise alarm and sound machine designed to improve sleep routines. Built introduced Puff Protein Bars, chocolate-covered marshmallows with 17 grams of protein.

articles.title: Oral-B iO 9 Review: AI-driven smart toothbrush to elevate oral care?
articles.author: Himank Tripathi
articles.summary: Oral-B has launched the iO Series 9, an AI-driven electric toothbrush. It features a magnetic motor, a 360-degree smart pressure sensor, seven cleaning modes, a full-color OLED display, and AI Brushing Recognition Technology. The toothbrush is priced at INR 8,250 after a 50% discount on Amazon.

articles.title: QuillBot Expands Into Visual Content: Launches AI-Powered Image Generation Tools
articles.author: The Tribune
articles.summary: QuillBot is expanding its services beyond writing assistance by launching a suite of AI-powered image tools. These tools include features like AI Image Generator, Background Remover, AI Logo Generator, and more, enabling users to create visuals for various purposes like content creation, branding, and design. This launch positions QuillBot as a comprehensive creative intelligence platform that combines text and visual creation capabilities.

articles.title: 39 Products With Satisfying Before And Afters Pics
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Many new cleaning products are being introduced that include: Little Green upholstery cleaner, Swiffer reusable microfiber mop pads, Baseboard Buddy, ChomChom pet hair remover roller, The Pink Stuff, The Pink Stuff All-Purpose Floor Cleaner, Tend Skin Solution, Downy fabric sprays, carpet cleaning shampoo solution, Goo Gone Adhesive Remover, OxiClean stain remover, and TubShroom. New cosmetic and care products are also being introduced that include: exfoliating stick, Spin Pins, plant-powered vitamin C serum, hyaluronic acid serum, jewelry cleaning pen, corn-remover pads, tattoo aftercare salve, and dandruff shampoo.

articles.title: Handcrafted soap shop Luna & Co. Soapery opens in Babylon
articles.author: Mary Elizabeth Andriotis
articles.summary: Luna & Co. Soapery, a new store opened in April by Patricia and Marc Korte, offers handcrafted soaps and other products made with natural ingredients. Their product line includes planetary soaps ($8) and perfumes ($60) and their most popular Goddess Ritual Body Oils. In addition to retail, they also offer services such as custom soap creation for events and sell products wholesale.

articles.title: Domino's Pizza unveils first brand refresh in over a decade with new logo and jingle
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Domino's Pizza launched its first major rebrand in more than a decade. The rebrand introduces modernized offerings.

articles.title: Dyson cuts £150 off cordless vacuum that 'catches 99.99% of germs'
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Dyson has reduced the price of its V8 Absolute vacuum to £249.99. The Shark PowerPro Cordless Stick Vacuum with Anti Hair Wrap & Floor Detect is priced at £199.99. VAX also sells its HomePro Plus Cordless Vacuum Cleaner for £169.99.

articles.title: Telegram New Update Released: CEO Pavel Durov Lists 12 New Feature Added to Platform Including Gift Signature Removal, Suggested Birthdays and More
articles.author: Kalpesh Sharma
articles.summary: Telegram released a new update featuring 12 enhancements including end-to-end encryption for comments and reactions in calls, notes for contacts, suggested birthdays, threads & streaming for AI Bots, bugs and suggestions for Mini Apps, improved Gift UI, on-chain NFTs on profiles and liquid glass input field & tabs. These additions aim to enrich the user's interaction with the platform.

articles.title: How bad can a £69 Android phone be? I found out
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto G06, an Android smartphone, in September for £69.  The phone features a 6.88-inch screen, MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme processor, 4GB RAM, and 64GB storage (expandable via microSD).  It also includes a 50MP rear camera, 8MP selfie camera, headphone jack, and 5,200mAh battery.

articles.title: Review: Skullcandy Method 360 ANC earbuds excel with one superior feature
articles.author: Steve Wollaston
articles.summary: Skullcandy has launched the Method 360 ANC earbuds, featuring premium build quality, BOSE sound, 40-hour battery life, and customizable sound via an app. The company also released the Crusher ANC 2 headphones, known for their powerful bass vibration and comfortable design, available for £190 via Amazon.

articles.title: Tech review: Skullcandy Method 360 ANC earbuds excel with one superior feature
articles.author: Midlands
articles.summary: Skullcandy has launched the Method 360 ANC earbuds, priced at £99.99 and available on Amazon UK. These earbuds feature noise cancellation, customizable sound via an app, and touch functionality. Skullcandy also released the Crusher ANC 2 headphones for £190 via Amazon, highlighting their powerful bass vibration feature.

articles.title: Dyson hairdryer dubbed 'best ever' now £100 cheaper at Boots
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: Dyson Supersonic Nural™ Hair Dryer Ceramic Patina is now available at Boots with a £100 discount, bringing the price down to £299.99. The hair dryer features auto-adaptation for enhanced shine and scalp protection, fast drying capabilities, and personalized styling preferences with five attachments.

articles.title: These 40 Products Will Take On Tedious Tasks So You Don't Have To
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article introduces an array of new products designed for convenience and efficiency. These include a versatile veggie chopper, anti-humidity spray, Downy fabric spray for wrinkle removal, and Scrubbing Bubbles toilet cleaning stamp. Also included are a Windex outdoor glass cleaner, a fast-acting lawn repair formula, dishwasher and washing machine cleaning tablets, and a drip dry cleaner for chandeliers.

articles.title: Singapore's new wave of authentic Chinese dumplings
articles.author: Hedy Khoo
articles.summary: Several dumpling brands are launching or expanding their presence in Singapore, introducing regional Chinese flavors and fresh dumpling concepts. Yuen Kee Dumpling is rapidly expanding with multiple outlets, while Jiao Tai Yuan Handmade Dumplings and Zhang Ji Yun Jiao are showcasing northern Chinese and Shandong-style dumplings, respectively. Even established brands such as Paradise Group introduced LeMa Dumpling which specializes in Taiwanese-style dumplings.

articles.title: Manforce introduces Myra Kapoor, an AI-generated model, as their brand ambassador
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Manforce Condoms, under Mankind Pharma, has launched Myra Kapoor, an AI-powered brand ambassador, and a new television commercial. The initiative includes a digital competition called "India's Most Desirable" in partnership with FilterCopy to introduce Myra.

articles.title: Brandtune.com Redefines the Domain Market with Ready-to-Launch Digital Brands
articles.summary: Brandtune.com has launched a premium domain marketplace that offers hand-curated domain names, logos, color palettes, and branding kits. This service aims to provide startups with a fast path to brand success by delivering a complete brand foundation. Each domain purchased on Brandtune.com includes a professionally designed logo, a color palette, and style guidelines.

articles.title: 42 Items That'll Knock The Other Versions Out Of Orbit
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products. Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream. Catrice launched an updated version of its "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener with four shades. CRZ Yoga released ~Butterluxe~ leggings. The Pink Stuff launched "Sqeezy" sponge set. Lumify introduced Eye Drops. Dr. Melaxin released "Peel Shot". Clinique is offering Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Eos introduced Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere Shave Oil. Oxo launched Cold Brew Rapid Brewer. L'Oreal Paris has released Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist. Biodance introduced Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask. Uniqlo launched Round Mini Shoulder Bag. I Dew Care launched dry shampoo powder. Touchland introduced Glow Mist hydrating hand sanitizer. MagicMinerals launched AirBrush Foundation. Béis launched Crescent Weekender Bag and Built launched Puff Protein Bars.

articles.title: Stray Kids Launch Pop-up Store for Encore Concerts, Offering Exclusive Merchandise and Fan Experiences
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Stray Kids launched a limited-time pop-up store from October 18, 2025, to November 3, 2025, offering exclusive merchandise like apparel, accessories, photocards, home goods, albums, and light sticks. The pop-up store also provides immersive fan experiences such as photo zones, interactive displays, and listening stations.

articles.title: The $4.19 Aldi Find My Family Eats Almost Every Day
articles.author: Kris Osborne
articles.summary: Aldi offers Breakfast Best Buttermilk & Vanilla Protein Waffles for $4.19 per box. The waffles contain 12 grams of protein per serving and can be used in breakfasts, sandwiches, and desserts. They are versatile and suitable for various meals beyond breakfast.

articles.title: 37 Products You'll Want To Rave About
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Catrice introduces "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a tinted concealer with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. Laneige launches Neo Blurring Powder, designed to matte-ify skin with blue hyaluronic acid. Mielle releases Rosemary Mint strengthening oil, a biotin-infused formula for hair. Nivea offers a lightweight gel cream with Q10 to improve skin's firmness, while Gold Bond introduces firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Hanalei introduces Lip Treatment featuring Hawaiian kukui nut oil. Megababe releases anti-chafing balm with aloe, pomegranate, and grapeseed oil. FryAway launches Waste Cooking Oil Solidifier Powder, and Burt's Bees offers holy grail sunburn soother with both aloe and coconut oil.

articles.title: Sandisk Creator Phone SSD review: Great MagSafe hack for iPhone users tired of deleting photos
articles.author: International Business Times
articles.summary: SanDisk has launched its new 'Creator Series,' a storage solution targeting content creators. The series includes five new products designed to meet the on-the-go storage requirements of this user group.

articles.title: CES's Standout Dreame Robot Vacuums Remain at Its Prime Day All-Time Low, Plus Extra Code Savings
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Dreame introduced the Dreame X50 Ultra (Complete) at CES 2025. It is a self-cleaning vacuum and mop with tangle-proof features. The product impressed the tech community.

articles.title: Bluehost Expands Global Coverage with High-Performance Data Centers to Deliver Ultra Low-Latency Hosting
articles.author: My Horry News
articles.summary: A new localized hosting service is designed for growing brands. This service aims to enable world-class, conversion-ready experiences. It eliminates enterprise complexity and cost.

articles.title: Something New is Finally Coming to a Long-vacant Lot in Egg Harbor Twp., NJ
articles.author: Chris Coleman
articles.summary: Spark Car Wash is planning to launch a new location at 6024 Black Horse Pike in Egg Harbor Township. The new location will feature subscription car cleaning services and numerous vacuums. Spark Car Wash, which already has ten locations in Pennsylvania and New Jersey, has twelve new locations coming soon, including the Egg Harbor Township site and another in Hammonton.

articles.title: Motors with Joe Rayfus: Sprinter still going strong
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz is launching the Sprinter Premium Edition 30 Years, a special edition of its Sprinter van. This model features upgrades like ARTICO leatherette upholstery, a heated driver's seat, the MBUX multimedia system, and a 190hp 319 CDI engine. The van is available through authorised Mercedes-Benz Commercial dealers across Ireland with prices starting at €48,180.
